list-item.p: The computer-aided approach helps in defining the potential small molecules for therapeutic drugs against FIPV.
The compounds bound to FIPV 3CL pro active site and showed inhibitory effects in protease- and cell-based assays.
The best three compounds contained an acyl group, which fitted well in the binding pocket of FIPV 3CL pro.
All the candidate compounds could be optimized based on the Ro5 recommendation for further drug development.
